original_text:
The children born during your bereavement
    will yet say in your hearing,
‘This place is too small for us;
    give us more space to live in.’
korean_text: 자식을 잃었을 때에 낳은 자녀가 후일에 네 귀에 말하기를 이곳이 내게 좁으니 넓혀서 내가 거주하게 하라 하리니

sentences.original_text: The children born during your bereavement
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 상실 기간 동안 태어난 자녀들이

sentences.original_text: will yet say in your hearing,
'This place is too small for us;
give us more space to live in.'
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 살 더 넓은 공간을 주소서.'
